duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and direct all Operations and Maintenance Services, ensuring safety compliance and high-quality work delivery.
Manage day-to-day maintenance operations, projects, out-of-scope work, and staff training and development.
Oversee parts inventory and ordering to minimize downtime and ensure operational continuity.
Complete all required reports and ensure compliance with daily safety checks and quality control measures.
Implement SOPs to improve operations and ensure timely completion of all projects.
Develop and deploy training modules for staff and maintain control of all spare parts and equipment inventories.
Coordinate down-system contingency planning and failure protocols, and prepare and submit performance and status reports.
Adhere to airport safety program and carry out duties in a diverse and multicultural environment.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent. Bachelor's Degree preferred.
